column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////The ramen here is pretty tasty indeed. Last trip
column2: we got the Black and the Spicy Tonkatsu. Both were yummy
column3: but I think my preference of the two was the Black
column4: though I preferred the thick noodles of the spicy tonkatsu. Broth here has good depth and richness to it. My favorite part was the noodles though. On both accounts
column5: they were perfectly al-dente with just enough chew/mouth feel to make it very satisfying. Â Service was good as well. Nothing overly stellar
column6: but good food at a good price.
